AuthFilterHandler - Class in octoteam.tahiti.server.pipeline
该模块可以在未登录情况下过滤管道中的上行推送 (Push) 消息和下行请求 (Request) 消息.
AuthFilterHandler() - Constructor for class octoteam.tahiti.server.pipeline.AuthFilterHandler
 
AuthFilterHandlerTest - Class in octoteam.tahiti.server.pipeline
 
AuthFilterHandlerTest() - Constructor for class octoteam.tahiti.server.pipeline.AuthFilterHandlerTest
 
AuthRequestHandler - Class in octoteam.tahiti.server.pipeline
该模块处理下行的登录请求 (Request)，通过 `AccountService` 进行验证。 无论成功或者失败，该模块都会发送该请求的响应 (Response) 消息。 响应消息会处于三种状态中的一种：成功、用户名未找到、用户名或密码错误。 对于成功的情况，该模块还会标记当前连接状态为已登录。
AuthRequestHandler(AccountService) - Constructor for class octoteam.tahiti.server.pipeline.AuthRequestHandler
 
AuthRequestHandlerTest - Class in octoteam.tahiti.server.pipeline
 
AuthRequestHandlerTest() - Constructor for class octoteam.tahiti.server.pipeline.AuthRequestHandlerTest
